CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1946, pg. 32, reads: "New Discovery - Typical of the talent which seems come naturally to native sons of this town, Conrad Clark, 12-year-old piano stylist, plays a number off stage for members of the choral group. Conrad moved right into stardom with the other artists when he captured the audience with 'Begin the Beguine,' Eddie Haywood brand."
TitMainTitle: Choral group of men and women standing around Conrad "Sonny" Clark, playing piano backstage of Syria Mosque during Night of Stars event
